questions.questionText: Which of the following best defines a plane in geometry?
options: Option A: A flat surface that extends infinitely in all directions.
Option B: A curved surface with no edges.
Option C: A line segment connecting two points.
Option D: A collection of parallel lines.

questions.questionText: Explain the properties of a line in geometry.
Which type of angle measures exactly 90 degrees?

questions.questionTask: Identify and name three points, a line, and a plane in the following geometric diagram.
